title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, May 6, 2022
description: “Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.” And “The ego is not master in its own house.” –Sigmund Freud, born on this day in 1856.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.” And “The ego is not master in its own house.” –Sigmund Freud, born on this day in 1856.
